title: Character Creation
content: take into account which Weapons you generally gravitate towards or which Weapons will best suit your playstyle and then adjust your Race options according to which ones will give you the proficiency for your preferred Weapon or Equipment. If you choose a race that happens to not have the proficiency you need, you can also browse through the Classes and Backgrounds to gain the Proficiency you are looking for.
